column4: hi! can anybody tell me why firefox doesn't find any flash plugin when it is installed via Applications->Add/Remove...?
how can i find out if flash works if youtube etc. don't work?
so you cannot see youtube videos?
if this is the indicator, then i have to say: no, it doesn work
firefox just seems to know nothing about any flash plugin
on some sites it even offers me the installation of the "missing plugin"  (although i have already installed it!)
but when as i click "install missing plugins" it doesnt find anything appropriate
sudo apt-get reinstall flashplugin-nonfree libflashsupport libflash-swfplayer
I have already tried that- doesn't work either
